EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2016-05-11-OpenStack Mitaka Webinar.EMAIL-Follow Up Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Attending The OpenStack Mitaka: Updates From Release 13 Webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, Thank you for attending the OpenStack Mitaka: Updates From Release 13 Webinar. We hope you left with some useful takeaways!
Please feel free to watch the webinar on demand at your convenience! You can find the recording here <[[http://vmturbo.com/thx-wbnr-rcrd-openstack-mitaka/]]>.
If you have any questions about the webinar please reach out to your account representative or our Evaluation Team <[[mailto:evalteam@vmturbo.com]]>. - The VMTurbo Team
